message.name: ERR_CASE_PREVIOUSLY_APPROVED_XRV
message.locale: This case has been previously approved and therefore the start date cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_CERTIFICATION_START_DATE_BEFORE_CASE_START_DATE_XFV
message.locale: Certification records exist prior to the case start date entered.

message.name: INF_COMPONENTS_EXIST_BEFORE_CASE_START_DATE
message.locale: Component assignment records existed for the period prior to the new case start date. Please check if component assignments need to be modified.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_EXIST_WITHIN_CASE_START_DATE_PERIOD_XRV
message.locale: Evidence exists within the new case start date period.
